formTitle.fieldDescription: HTML ID attribute to apply to the component.
formTitle.name: ./formTitle

closeButtonTitle.fieldDescription: HTML ID attribute to apply to the component.
closeButtonTitle.name: ./closeButtonTitle

redirectField.fieldDescription: Leave empty to redisplay the form after submission
redirectField.name: ./redirect

id.fieldDescription: HTML ID attribute to apply to the component.
id.name: ./id

captchaScript.fieldDescription: Message displayed as tooltip to add the recaptcha script
captchaScript.name: ./captchaScript

showFirstName.fieldDescription: If checked , will show first name only on submit | default will show both First Name and Last Name
showFirstName.name: ./isFirstName

successTitle.fieldDescription: Please add form success title ,i.e. Thank You, {first_name} {last_name}
successTitle.name: ./successTitle

successDescription.fieldDescription: Message displayed as a form success description
successDescription.name: ./successDescription

ctaLink.fieldDescription: Displayed as a Link After Form Success
ctaLink.name: ./ctaLink

ctaLabel.fieldDescription: Displayed as a Link After Form Success
ctaLabel.name: ./ctaLabel

loadingTitle.fieldDescription: Message displayed as a form submission failed due to backend system
loadingTitle.name: ./loadingTitle

loadingSubtitle.fieldDescription: Message displayed as a form server side validation error
loadingSubtitle.name: ./loadingSubtitle

loadingText.fieldDescription: Message displayed as a form submission failed due to backend system
loadingText.name: ./loadingText
